title: Kyndryl Sinks as CFO Departs, Accounting Review Disclosed
description: Shares of Kyndryl Holdings Inc., an International Business Machines Corp. spinoff, plunged Monday after the company announced key leadership exits and a review of its accounting practices.
content: Shares of Kyndryl Holdings Inc., an International Business Machines Corp. spinoff, plunged Monday after the company announced key leadership exits and a review of its accounting practices.
